about.headline: Clarion Inn & Suites, Orlando
content: Clarion Inn & Suites by Choices Hotels is ideal whether travelling for business or pleasure. Universal Studios Orlando is located 1.7 km from Clarion Inn & Suites. The hotel is conveniently located near International Drive so that you can reach Fun Spot America, Orlando, and Titanic: The Artifact Exhibition in about 10 minutes.

Each room and suite are thoughtfully designed and offers fully equipped living/working areas, premium bedding, large flat-screen television and more. The rooms feature modern-style decor and private bathrooms with a hairdryer, a bathtub and towels.

room.headline: Rooms & Suites are Packed with Top-notch Amenities
content: The newly renovated rooms and suites are packed with amenities, including refrigerators and coffee makers. After a long day of exploring the theme parks, unwind by the outdoor pool, in the hot tub, or at one of our restaurants or bars. The hotel features an on-site Roast caf√© & Tabla restaurant and lobby bar.

Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. At the on-site restaurant and bar, you may grab a bite to eat and a refreshing drink. Clarion Inn & Suites also provides a free scheduled shuttle service to Universal Orlando. Friendly reception and free parking are among the additional perks.
